[[Image:Coat of arms of Canada.svg|right|thumb|200px|The Court of Appeal for Ontario uses the Royal Arms of Canada to represent the Queen of Canada as the font of justice.]]
 
The '''Court of Appeal for Ontario''' (frequently referred to as '''Ontario Court of Appeal''' or '''OCA''') is headquartered in [[downtown]] [[Toronto, Ontario|Toronto]], in historic [[Osgoode Hall]].
The '''Court of Appeal for Ontario''' (frequently referred to as '''Ontario Court of Appeal''' or '''OCA''') is headquartered in [[downtown]] [[Toronto, Ontario|Toronto]], in historic [[Osgoode Hall]].
